title: Magnificent.Obsession.1954.DVDRip.x264
description:
Reckless playboy Bob Merrick (Rock Hudson, in his breakthrough role) crashes his speedboat, requiring emergency attention from the townÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s only resuscitatorÃ¢â‚¬â€at the very moment that beloved local Dr. Phillips has a heart attack and dies waiting for the life-saving device. Thus begins one of Douglas SirkÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most flamboyant master classes in melodrama, a delirious Technicolor mix of the sudsy and the spiritual in which Bob and the doctorÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s widow, Helen (Jane Wyman), find themselves inextricably linked amid a series of increasingly wild twists, turns, trials, and tribulations.
